<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Comprehension Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3303)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 287 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bitter draft opens your mind to the potential of the written word. For the listed duration after drinking this elixir, you can understand any words you read, as long as they're written in a common language. This elixir doesn't automatically allow you to understand codes or extremely esoteric passages—you still need to attempt a skill check to [Decipher Writing](/Actions.aspx?ID=2363).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
